definition: lit. ten thousand fathoms/fig. extremely high or deep/lofty/bottomless
measure of length, ten Chinese feet (3.3 m)/to measure/husband/polite appellation for an older male
towering buildings are built up from the ground (idiom)/great oaks from little acorns grow
pinyin: wan4 zhang4 gao1 lou2 ping2 di4 qi3

sentences.english: High buildings rise from the flat ground.
I have a very young and ambitious Chinese friend.
sentences.chinese: 我有一個年輕與雄心萬丈的中國朋友。

sentences.english: Stream north Huping cliff, towering cliffs, towering like a bottle-shaped pot and name.
sentences.chinese: 澗北有壺瓶崖，危崖萬丈，突兀類壺瓶狀而名。

sentences.english: And Sheldon is action more cream soup out of light waves.
sentences.chinese: 而曉東的行動更激湯出萬丈波瀾。

sentences.english: Q.Are you as enthusiastic now as you were?
sentences.chinese: 你現在還和從前一樣豪情萬丈嗎？

sentences.english: Clearly know is the abyss, I still smiling to see you jump down.
sentences.chinese: 明明知道是萬丈深淵，我還是笑着看你往下跳。

sentences.english: Only has dream can has lofty sentiments.
sentences.chinese: 只有心存夢想，方能豪情萬丈。

sentences.english: The Rat danced up and down in the road, simply transported with passion.
sentences.chinese: 老鼠怒火萬丈，在路上又蹦又跳。

sentences.english: Two people return cabin, was blown to fall by bizzard however abyss.
sentences.chinese: 兩人回到小木屋，卻被大風雪吹落下了萬丈深淵。

sentences.english: I watched C-beams glitter in the dark near the Tannhauser gate.
sentences.chinese: 萬丈光芒在天堂之門的黑暗裏閃耀。

sentences.english: She had not fallen into the abyss.
The flat of your hand touched rays of light at dim night.
sentences.chinese: 那時夜空昏仄，掌心卻觸摸到了萬丈光芒。

sentences.english: One flake and then another , and the deepest snow is laid.
sentences.chinese: 一片一片地積，萬丈雪層深似山。

sentences.english: I watched C-beams glitter in the darkness at Tannhäuser Gate.
sentences.chinese: 我注視萬丈光芒在天國之門的黑暗裏閃耀。

sentences.english: The path was very steep and narrow suspending over formidable abyss.
sentences.chinese: 路窄坡陡，兩邊是萬丈深淵。

sentences.english: The North Koreans were taken aback by the strength of that response from China.
sentences.chinese: 北朝鮮人由於中國的此行爲而豪情萬丈。

definition: vast and mighty (of river or ocean)/broad and powerful
sudden clap of thunder/fig. surprising turn of events
(literary) the vast sky/(finance) eventual downturn/poor prospects in the long term
lit. ten thousand stampeding horses (idiom)/fig. with great momentum/going full speed ahead
